findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase over the allowed limit of 25%. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the setonSellFee function with a high percentage value.

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop contracts from transactions. The owner may take advantage of it by calling the blacklistAddress function.
